text: Ivonaldo Viegas Dias Mendes (born 5 May 1993), simply known as Ivonaldo, is a São Toméan footballer who plays as a defender for UD Rei Amador and the São Tomé and Príncipe national team. ==International career== Ivonaldo made his international debut for São Tomé and Príncipe in 2014. ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:São Tomé and Príncipe footballers Category:São Tomé and Príncipe international footballers Category:Sporting Praia Cruz players Category:UDRA players
title: Ivonaldo
